title: Say my name (ronaldinhosoccer64, spummy Boothy)
description: One of the  most fun things to do on Counter Strike: Global Offensive is to ask match-made teammates in a < 5-stack to say your name over voice comms. Honourable mentions are to the gentleman who said RonaldhinhoSoccer64, and the other esteemed  individual who read out: Spummy Boothy
